remarks: Minus a vector plus itself.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
vcrinv.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` W ) $.
vcrinv.2 $e |- S = ( 2nd ` W ) $.
vcrinv.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
vcrinv.4 $e |- Z = ( GId ` G ) $.
vclinv $p |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( -u 1 S A ) G A ) = Z ) $.
